```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE)
library(tidyverse)
#source("R/shiny-functions.R")
sim <- readRDS("data/sim.rds")
to_jitter <- bind_rows(
  sim$data$seedoutput %>% select(X, Y, life_stage, gen),
  sim$data$juveniles %>% select(X, Y, life_stage, gen)
)
to_jitter$life_stage <- as.factor(to_jitter$life_stage)
to_point <- sim$data$adults %>% select(X, Y, life_stage, gen)
```

---

```{r landscape}
sliderInput("gen", "Generation", min = 1, max = 200, value = 0, step = 1, width = "100%")

renderPlot({
  this_gen_jitter <- to_jitter %>% filter(gen == input$gen)
  this_gen_points <- to_point %>% filter(gen == input$gen)
  ggplot(
    data = this_gen_jitter,
      aes(
        x = X + .5,
        y = Y + .5,
        colour = life_stage,
        alpha = .2
      )
  ) +
  geom_jitter(width = .5, height = .5) +
  geom_point(data = to_point) +
  scale_x_continuous(
    breaks = seq(0, 40, by = 10),
    limits = c(0, 41),
    minor_breaks = 0:40
  ) +
  scale_y_continuous(
    breaks = seq(0, 40, by = 10),
    limits = c(0, 41),
    minor_breaks = 0:40
  ) +
  scale_colour_discrete(
    name = "Life stage",
    labels = c("Seeds", "Juveniles", "Adults"),
    h = c(20, 180),
    l = 50
  ) +
  theme_classic() +
  theme(
    panel.grid.major = element_line(
      size = .5,
      linetype = "solid",
      colour = "gray"
    ),
    panel.grid.minor = element_line(
      size = .25,
      linetype = "solid",
      colour = "gray"
    ),
    legend.position = "top"
  ) +
  xlab("X") +
  ylab("Y") +
  scale_alpha(guide = F)
},
width = 780,
height = 500
)
```
